abstract: A Canadian court rejected Carl C. Icahn’s effort to nullify an equity-for-debt swap by Lions Gate that diluted the billionaire investor’s stake to about 33 percent from 38 percent.
snippet: A Canadian court rejected Carl C. Icahn’s effort to nullify an equity-for-debt swap by Lions Gate that diluted the billionaire investor’s stake to about 33 percent from 38 percent.
lead_paragraph: Another week brings another setback for Carl C. Icahn in his bid to gain control of Lions Gate Entertainment.

headline.main: Icahn Loses Battle in Canada With Lions Gate
